Parte B. RESUMEN LIBRE DEL CURRÍCULUM 
Professional biography 
Mariano Rico is a Postdoctoral Researcher (funded by National Spanish Research Ministry 
under Juan de la Cierva Programme) at the Ontology Engineering Group (OEG) in the 
Artificial Intelligence Department (DIA) at Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM), Spain. 
Fecha del CVA  
 30/03/2016
